title: Micro-cynicon. Sixe snarling satyres Insatiat Cron. Prodigall Zodon. Insolent Superbia. Cheating Droone. Ingling Pyander. Wise Innocent.
author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627, attributed name.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Thomas Creede, for Thomas Bushell, and are to be sold at his shop at the north doore of Paules Church,
